targets.expr: sum by(method, uri) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", service="axon-showcase-api-gateway", uri!~"/actuator.*"}[1m])) / sum by(method, uri) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", service="axon-showcase-api-gateway", uri!~"/actuator.*"}[1m]))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, method, uri) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{application="$application", service="axon-showcase-api-gateway", uri!~"/actuator.*"}[1m])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(le, method, uri) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{application="$application", service="axon-showcase-api-gateway", uri!~"/actuator.*"}[1m])))
